argument.name: delimiter
argument.description: Optional. Default = CR-LF. The character expression that separates entries in the list.

page.description: Remove duplicate sequential entries from the list.
page.discussion: The *REMOVE_DUPLICATES() function removes duplicate entries from a list. The list must be sorted in ascending order first. Limitation: The Old_List argument is case sensitive.
page.example: dim list as C list = <<%str% one two three four Two one %str% list = sortsubstr(list, crlf() ) ? *remove_duplicates(list) = four one three Two two
